creator: truffls
descriptionHtml:
Your next Job in a German metropolis? Using the truffls Job App your search will be successful! Easier than ever we will connect you with interesting companies.

Choose your city:

NEW! NEW! NEW! NEW! NEW!
Hanover
Nuremberg
Mannheim
NEW! NEW! NEW! NEW! NEW!

Berlin
Bremen
Dortmund
Dresden
Dusseldorf
Essen
Frankfurt
Hamburg
Leipzig
Munich
Cologne
Stuttgart

Choose your fields:

Marketing & PR
Sales
Admin & Assistance
HR
Purchasing & Logistics
IT & Tech
Engineering
Design
Finance


Here’s how it works:

1. Fill out your application profile: in the app, on the PC or simply by importing your Xing Profile.
2. Choose the cities and the businesses you’d like to work in. Whether full-time, part-time or freelance - our filter options are ensuring a detailed search.
3. If you like a job simply swipe right and we send your profile directly to the company.
4. If the company is impressed by your profile a match will happen. Now you can send messages and documents through our internal messenger.


Digital and personal:

No matter your lifestyle, we are here for you. Truffls is your go-to partner. Together we’ll shape the future, that’s why we are open to every question, suggestion, request and recommendation. Just shoot a message through our messenger.


Rights:

Share your location - so we can show you jobs near you.
Access to memory / photos / media / files - this completes your truffls profile. Upload a profile photo or use a CV on your phone to import entries into your truffls profile.
Identity - so we can automatically suggest accounts you have stored on your phone.


More:

Website: https://www.truffls.de/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Turns out, your job isn’t that much better while working from home? Maybe it’s time to start looking left and right … eh - of course we mean swiping! This new version has some minor optimizations and improvements, but most importantly: we continue to be here for you - especially now, helping you find a job that allows you to pursue your talents!

title: Job App - truffls

creator: truffls
descriptionHtml:
You’re searching for a job in business and tech but can’t find the time to write countless applications? We have THE solution for you. Truffls brings you together with interesting companies as easy as never before. You apply via swipe. Fast, easy and mobile.

You live in a big city? Cool!
You do not live in a big city? Great!
There are jobs in all metropolitan areas in Germany.

Hamburg (+ surrounding area including Lübeck, Lüneburg and Schwerin)
Bremen (+ surrounding area incl. Oldenburg and Bremerhaven)
Hanover (+ surrounding area incl. Wolfsburg, Göttingen and Braunschweig)
Berlin (+ surrounding area incl. Potsdam)
East Westphalia (incl. Bielefeld and Münster)
Central Germany (including Dresden, Erfurt, Zwickau and Leipzig)
Rhine-Ruhr area (including Dortmund, Essen, Düsseldorf and Cologne)
Rhine-Main area (including Frankfurt and Mainz)
Mannheim (+ surrounding area including Heidelberg and Karlsruhe)
Nuremberg (+ surrounding area including Würzburg, Bayreuth and Regensburg)
Stuttgart (+ surrounding area incl. Ulm and Tübingen)
Munich (+ surrounding area including Augsburg, Ingolstadt and Passau)


Choose the field in which you’d like to search for job offers (note that we almost exclusively offer jobs that take place in an office):

Marketing & PR
Sales
Admin & Assistance
HR
Purchasing & Logistics
IT & Tech
Engineering
Design
Finance


Here’s how it works:

1. Fill out your application profile: in the app, on the PC or simply by importing your Xing Profile.
2. Choose the cities and the businesses you’d like to work in. Whether full-time, part-time or freelance - our filter options are ensuring a detailed search.
3. If you like a job simply swipe right and we send your profile directly to the company.
4. If the company is impressed by your profile a match will happen. Now you can send messages and documents through our internal messenger.


Digital and personal:

No matter your lifestyle, we are here for you. Truffls is your go-to partner. Together we’ll shape the future, that’s why we are open to every question, suggestion, request and recommendation. Just shoot a message through our messenger.


Rights:

Share your location - so we can show you jobs near you.
Access to memory / photos / media / files - this completes your truffls profile. Upload a profile photo or use a CV on your phone to import entries into your truffls profile.
Identity - so we can automatically suggest accounts you have stored on your phone.


More:

Website: https://www.truffls.de/


Follow us:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/truffls_jobapp
XING: https://www.xing.com/companies/truffls
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/truffls-gmbh/

descriptionShort: You apply by swiping. Fast, easy and mobile.
title: Job App - truffls

creator: truffls
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to truffls – the #1 job app alternative to Indeed, StepStone, Monster etc. Forget about job hunting – truffls is all about finding a job. truffls suggests the jobs and vacancies that best match your resume, and – unlike any conventional job board – you simply swipe to submit your application. You can easily upload your resume in the app or import it from external sources. XING and LinkedIn are available for your account creation as well as Facebook, Google or your email address. The truffls mobile job app is the best place to take your career to the next level.


+++ Candidates have already applied more than 7 million times via truffls
+++ More than 30,000 companies have already used truffls for their recruiting – including About You, Academic Work, Aroundhome, Audibene, Auto1, Avantgarde, Enpal, Everphone, IUBH, Krongaard, Michael Page, Otto Group, Smava, TikTok, Vodafone, ...
+++ truffls is known from: BILD, Berliner Morgenpost, Business Punk, CHIP, Computer BILD, Die WELT, Focus, Gründerszene, N24, ntv, RTL, t3n, DER SPIEGEL, Tagesschau and many more.


Jobs and vacancies are available at truffls in all major cities and metropolitan regions in Germany:

Jobs in Hamburg (+ surrounding area incl. Lübeck, Lüneburg and Schwerin)
Jobs in Bremen (+ surrounding area incl. Oldenburg and Bremerhaven)
Jobs in Hannover (+ surrounding area incl. Wolfsburg, Göttingen and Braunschweig)
Jobs in Berlin (+ surrounding area incl. Potsdam)
Jobs in East Westphalia (incl. Bielefeld and Münster)
Jobs in Central Germany (incl. Dresden, Erfurt, Zwickau and Leipzig)
Jobs in the Rhine-Ruhr area (incl. Dortmund, Essen, Düsseldorf and Cologne)
Jobs in the Rhine-Main area (incl. Frankfurt and Mainz)
Jobs in Mannheim (+ surrounding area incl. Heidelberg and Karlsruhe)
Jobs in Nuremberg (+ surrounding area incl. Würzburg, Bayreuth and Regensburg)
Jobs in Stuttgart (+ surrounding area incl. Ulm and Tübingen)
Jobs in Munich (+ surrounding area incl. Augsburg, Ingolstadt and Passau)


Select the area in which you would like to find job offers (note that we almost exclusively offer jobs that take place in the office):

Jobs in Marketing & PR
Jobs in Sales
Jobs in Admin & Assistance
Jobs in HR
Jobs in Purchasing & Logistics
Jobs in IT & Tech
Jobs in Engineering
Jobs in Design
Jobs in Finance


This is how it works:

1. Fill out your application profile: In the app, on your PC or simply via XING import.
2. Choose the cities and types of business you would like to work at. Regardless of whether you prefer full-time, part-time or freelance – our filtering options allow for detailed results.
3. Whenever you like a job, just swipe right and your profile will be forwarded directly to the company.
4. If the company is enthusiastic about your profile, you can exchange messages and documents directly in the messenger and discuss the next steps until you are successfully hired!


Permissions:

Share location – so we can show you jobs near you.
Access to memory/photos/media/files – this will make your truffls profile complete. Upload a profile photo or use a resume on your phone to import entries into your truffls profile.
Identity – so that we can automatically suggest accounts for you to log in that are stored on your phone.


Website: https://www.truffls.de/


Follow us:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Truffls
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/truffls_jobapp
XING: https://www.xing.com/companies/truffls
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/truffls-gmbh/

creator: truffls
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to truffls – the #1 job app alternative to Indeed, StepStone, Monster etc. Forget about job hunting – truffls is all about finding a job. truffls suggests the jobs and vacancies that best match your resume, and – unlike any conventional job board – you simply swipe to submit your application. The truffls mobile job app is the best place to take your career to the next level.


+++ Candidates have already applied more than 7 million times via truffls
+++ More than 30,000 companies have already used truffls for their recruiting – including About You, Academic Work, Aroundhome, Audibene, Auto1, Avantgarde, Enpal, Everphone, IUBH, Krongaard, Michael Page, Otto Group, Smava, TikTok, Vodafone, ...
+++ truffls is known from: BILD, Berliner Morgenpost, Business Punk, CHIP, Computer BILD, Die WELT, Focus, Gründerszene, N24, ntv, RTL, t3n, DER SPIEGEL, Tagesschau and many more.


Jobs and vacancies are available at truffls in all major cities and metropolitan regions in Germany:

Jobs in Hamburg (+ surrounding area incl. Lübeck, Lüneburg and Schwerin)
Jobs in Bremen (+ surrounding area incl. Oldenburg and Bremerhaven)
Jobs in Hannover (+ surrounding area incl. Wolfsburg, Göttingen and Braunschweig)
Jobs in Berlin (+ surrounding area incl. Potsdam)
Jobs in East Westphalia (incl. Bielefeld and Münster)
Jobs in Central Germany (incl. Dresden, Erfurt, Zwickau and Leipzig)
Jobs in the Rhine-Ruhr area (incl. Dortmund, Essen, Düsseldorf and Cologne)
Jobs in the Rhine-Main area (incl. Frankfurt and Mainz)
Jobs in Mannheim (+ surrounding area incl. Heidelberg and Karlsruhe)
Jobs in Nuremberg (+ surrounding area incl. Würzburg, Bayreuth and Regensburg)
Jobs in Stuttgart (+ surrounding area incl. Ulm and Tübingen)
Jobs in Munich (+ surrounding area incl. Augsburg, Ingolstadt and Passau)


Select the area in which you would like to find job offers (note that we almost exclusively offer jobs that take place in the office):

Jobs in Marketing & PR
Jobs in Sales
Jobs in Admin & Assistance
Jobs in HR
Jobs in Purchasing & Logistics
Jobs in IT & Tech
Jobs in Engineering
Jobs in Design
Jobs in Finance


This is how it works:

1. Fill out your application profile: In the app, on your PC or simply via XING import.
2. Choose the cities and types of business you would like to work at. Regardless of whether you prefer full-time, part-time or freelance – our filtering options allow for detailed results.
3. Whenever you like a job, just swipe right and your profile will be forwarded directly to the company.
4. If the company is enthusiastic about your profile, you can exchange messages and documents directly in the messenger and discuss the next steps until you are successfully hired!
